name: Ballfinity Room
description:
Game created during Community Game Jam.

Main theme for this Jam was..."The game is a liar"...
The game is simple - player, blue ball, has to reach end stage to win the game, but to do that, he has to associate with some objects - potions / tiles / enemies. 
Everything seems to be easy beside the fact that...everything could be a lie...

Good luck and have fun! The game has 10 stages, let me know if u can make it to the end! :) 

Based on 2D Roguelike Unity Tutorial.

Music used in the game: 
Blue Dot Sessions - Mystery Coat
